website_summaries.verdict: Eco-friendly cork cover with 180° lay-flat feature. High-quality, acid-free paper from recycled materials. Great value, considering versatility and quality.
pros: Environmentally friendly and vegan materials for eco-conscious consumers
High level of durability from cork fabric
All dot grid pages are perforated for easy tearing that doesn’t affect binding
Elastic closure and pen holder, as well as interior pocket for added organization
cons: Some bleeding depending on ink choice, and elastic details could stretch or detach after some use

customer_reviews.title: Generally speaking I enjoy this journal
customer_reviews.text: Generally speaking I enjoy this journal. It's my first time to try the bullet journal, so the removable pages are nice. There was a little bleed through of the markers/pens, but not horribly. The first book I got had some weird indetations,but I had already written in it before I noticed, so I just bought a new one
customer_reviews.author: Boop

customer_reviews.title: Love the cover but pages are perforated and the binding doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks and feels, the only thing I could possibly complain at all about is I didn’t know that the pages were perforated so I’m a little nervous about how this will work for constant use throughout the year without losing any pages **********edit********* So I’ve been using it as a bullet journal for less than 2 months and it just broke at the binding. It should be noted that I’m not rough with it, I usually just pull it out at night, and I’ve never had anything like this happen with ANY other journal I’ve ever used before. I’ve put so much hard work into it and this just breaks my heart
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product seems very sleek, simple, aesthetic, and eco-friendly. I love the look and the pocket on the inside, and I feel like there's meaning to it. This journal came from a family-run business, it came with a little warranty pamphlet, and stickers too. Even the packaging- a cute box saying, "This is a gift," spoke of what a personal product this is. I did not realize before purchasing that the pages were covered in dots rather than lines since there were no pictures, but I suppose I should have read the product description haha.
customer_reviews.author: 4girlymom

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 10 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I really love this notebook except for the fact that it detached from the binding after about 10 weeks of use. The company offers 100% satisfaction guarantee, so I’ve contacted them about a replacement. I’ll update my review to reflect to the ease or pain of the process. I emailed them and haven’t heard anything back. So much for satisfaction guaranteed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for bullet journals!!
customer_reviews.text: Goregous! An amazing notebook and is so pleasing! The notebook lays surprisingly flat and any point in the notebook. A great book for anyone who wants to start bullet journaling. the pages are fairly thick, enough to keep most markers and pens from bleeding through and enough to do a lil watercolor painting if youre careful. The cover is nice, but i dont have the info to say whether it truly is cork or not. The few greivances i have are how the pages are off white (while i know that they are in fact recycled sheets) and the spaces between the dots could be bigger (and that part i blame my large handwriting on)
customer_reviews.author: Liveanddiefishing

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sturdy bullet journal
customer_reviews.text: Love these journals! I’ve been using them for years. I usually fill one in 6 months and reference it frequently, and the wear is imperceptible I think. The cork cover is soft and sturdy. The pages are thick enough where only heavy marker shows through the other side and not terribly so - pages are also perforated so are easy to remove if you want but don’t come out by themselves like some other journals. If you are looking for a bulletin journal or just a high quality notebook, I would sincerely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick paper - Fountain Pen Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I go through a number of A5 notebooks annually for work. A couple of years ago I switched to using fountain pens exclusively, so a deal-breaker for me are notebook paper with excessive bleed through. This notebook has ZERO bleed through. I can use both sides of the paper with ease. I have used a variety of ink brands and colors, and the paper has stood up well. There are plenty of pages in the book and it is put together well. Compared to competing products in the market, these notebooks are a good deal. The cork cover is pretty cool as well. I'm sure I'll be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: John Wolnisty

customer_reviews.title: Love these Eco-Friendly Notebooks
customer_reviews.text: I've used several of these Eco-Friendly notebooks for writing, sent some as gifts, and have now started Bullet Journaling in the latest one. I never have to look for my pen with the loop, the pages fall open well, but don't fall out or apart unless I want to rip one out with the perforation lines. And I love the built in book marker, pocket, and loop to hold the book shut. It's the perfect size for my purse- and bonus that it's all eco-friendly! Exactly what I've been looking for, and will continue to purchase these as I fill mine up!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Quality bullet journal
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dotted journal. The cover is attractive and the pages are perforated. If I need to remove a page I can, but the pages are solidly in the book so they won't just fall out. The paper is nice and thick, with good texture. I tested pencils, ballpoint pen, highlighter, fountain pen, and sharpie on the pages. Most mediums will not bleed through except for sharpies and they only bled through a little. I will definitely make this a nice bujo (bullet journal) for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, sturdy notebook.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few journals I’ve bought from Amazon on my quest to buy cheap, yet sturdy notebooks. Since then, people have caught one and this is one of the most recommended that I see around. I’m generally just writing in mine with the occasional Tombow use to highlight a line or word. No ghosting or bleeding. I’d but this over and over again. I never really take my notebooks out of my home, but this one I did a few times because of the cover. Usually you get that faux leather that picks up every little ding and scrape. This one did not and I love that.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Love this journal.
customer_reviews.text: I love Lemone journals! Im pretty sure I am going to stay with this brand for life but as far as the cork version, I do enjoy it. It’s unique and I am inquired about it all the time. The only problem I have is the pages are precut, meaning you can rip out a page without ruining the spine. That’s perfectly fine but when getting towards the middle of the book the pages bend automatically and it makes it difficult to keep the page flat. No real complaints here, otherwise. This is a quality and durable bullet journal and I’d reccomend it’s purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jadedgemini14

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this journal. It is perfect for bullet journaling. The cover feels great. The dots are subtle, but helpful. The paper is thick enough where there is almost no bleed-through, no matter how much ink is used. I would definitely purchase this again and have gotten compliments on the journal itself several times since I’ve received it 2 days ago. I’ve attached a video of an ink-heavy page and its back to show what bleed-through did occur (which is definitely an acceptable amount in my mind given that I used markers)
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a notebook that I could throw in my purse and not have it fall apart. This notebook is perfect! Nice thick paper for taking my notes. It is durable and easily keeps up with my busy schedule. For pleasing to the eye. I will definitely be ordering another soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great notebook for bullet journaling
customer_reviews.text: I bought this notebook for my 2020 bullet journal. It was recommended on Reddit, especially for its thick paper. I have to say, it's amazing! I have tried using a regular school notebook, the Leuchtturm1917, and a generic notebook from Michael's for previous bullet journals. This Lemome one is the best by far! The pages are the perfect thickness. I haven't seen any ghosting even with my Tombow markers. I'm super excited to try watercolors in it! I think it should hold up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Hamblen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful journal
customer_reviews.text: This journal is beautiful with a rugged look. It came as expected and was protected in a small cover box. It has one bookmark string, a pen holder, and an elastic closure strap. It also has a folder in the back to hold a few items. The paper is thick and nice and the pages are perforated. One note that may be important to some is that it does not have a table of contents or page numbers. You will have to add your own if you use the journal in that way. Overall, I am very pleased with this journal and am excited to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this book, it seems to be very high quality. I have not found any cons with it yet. The cork cover is soft yet sturdy. The pages are nicely perforated for easy tearing if necessary. There is an attached bookmark, pen loop, and closure band as well as a pocket inside the back cover. There are no page numbers, so buyer beware if that is an issue for you. All in all, this is a great book and I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again. Deceptive!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and I am extremely disappointed. I never write reviews, but this product is by the far the most deceptive I have ever purchased. “Cork leather?” It doesn’t even stick to the binding! It’s just slapped on there and bubbles off the binding. There might be cork in it but they printed the image on top of it. I’ll use it because I don’t like wasting money and it’s a functional product, but I will definitely not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Poor quality.

customer_reviews.title: A decent journal
customer_reviews.text: I love how this journal looks on the outside - the cork look always impresses people who see it, although like others have said I doubt it's actually cork. The pages are a good thickness and I rarely have issues with bleed-through. I use the Tombow Fudenosuke Brush Pens and these work perfectly with the paper - it's my Winsor & Newton BrushMarkers that will have some bleed-through/ghosting. The dots on the pages don't always line up perfectly from one page to the next, but it's close enough for me that it's not a problem. Overall a great journal.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny P

customer_reviews.title: This is my absolute favorite planner
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this planner so much that I'm on my 3rd one. The outside texture is great. I can't explain how cool it feels. It's held up really well and doesn't look dirty. The pages themselves are well-printed and sturdy. They're a bit thicker than you would expect, so they're not likely to tear on you, even if you add adhesive tabs to help organize you. If you're fond of gel pens, though, make sure to give the ink some time to dry. I smeared quite a few times before I changed to a different type of ink.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Q

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings, but won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: • hard cover • page fits align on every page which makes it more predictable. • nice natural cover that isn’t leather. • elastic closing it • many pages Cons: •**Pages are an off-white, with a yellowish tiny.** •**Dots are too dark** • Doesn’t lay flat • Pages are perforated. Double asterisks for the reasons I won’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: YellowBlueGreen

customer_reviews.title: Scary crack when you first open it but actually really awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the book for the first time and was so worried that pages were going to fall out because I heard a loud crack, but I am so pleased with this book so far. The noise has not impacted the book at all. I am a person who needs the pages to be absolutely flat, and many times if the pages are just glued they will fall out. Not these. They are sewn in and it's awesome. I will totally buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen W.

customer_reviews.title: great size, great durability, great features!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second "Dotted Bullet Notebook/Journal - Eco-Friendly Natural Cork Hardcover Dot Grid Notebook" and I love it as much as my first one! the pages hold pen, marker or even watercolor (just not sharpie) without bleeding through! the folder on the inside is perfect for holding postit notes, or stencils. The pen holder as well as the book mark are other features I couldnt live without. However I would say my absolute favorite part of this journal is that it is made from recycled and eco friendly materials!
customer_reviews.author: Lauri Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I love this journal and will definitely be buying this brand ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this journal and will definitely be buying this brand in the future. The cover is cute and minimalistic. The binding, sublime. The page thickness is perfect and doesn't allow my Pilot Precise V5 Rolling Ball pens in extra fine bleed through at all which is always my problem. The pages are a cute, creamy color and the texture allows the pen ink to absorb almost instantly leaving very little risk for smudging. There is a nice envelope in the back for important documents or what-not, a keeper-closer for privacy, and a little pen loop for convenience. Over-all, this is probably one of the best journals I've bought and will be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Brookelynn

customer_reviews.title: Cover material is smooth to touch. Good-quality paper inside.
customer_reviews.text: The mater of the cover might be made of cork, as it cracks on some part of the edges. I bought this product for its sustainable materials, but I would appreciate that it tells you explicitly that the pattern on the cover is printed instead of real texture. Before I placed the order, I tried to examine the picture to see if it is the real texture from the original cork material. Now I received the product, I can see that the cover material is a thin cork sheet (hopefully), on which the texture pattern is printed. Inside pages are off-white, good quality paper. Perforation is there so pages can be easily tear off.
customer_reviews.author: SaveTrees

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why so many people are saying the cover isn't real cork; it definitely feels that way to me. The paper is thick but not too thick, and it's the standard off-white for most journals of this type. The perforated pages don't feel fragile but they do tear cleanly, which is what I was hoping for. I haven't had trouble with ink bleeding, though I favor gel pens and ballpoints over inkier types like fountain pens or brush pens. Everything feels sturdy and high-quality, and I am really pleasantly surprised overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought recently and the pages already split apart from the binding.
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write poor reviews and I wanted to love this cork journal. It is already split apart at the binding and I've barely used it. I've only had it for 2 months. Disappointed and would like a refund or a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Loved the idea
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered/received this notebook about a year and a half ago. Initially, it was great! This was my everyday notebook that I used at work for meetings and everything else in between. This notebook was opened and used several times everyday. A few months in the papers started to come out of the seams. Like whole clumps of papers where coming apart from the panel. I was so heartbroken because I loved this notebook. So it looks great but it only lasts a few months unfortunately if you use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perforated pages...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the description well enough before getting this journal and didn't realize that the pages are perforated. This is otherwise a great bullet journal, but the perforated pages bend really easily, are really prominent, and therefore make the spreads look a bit less nice than they otherwise might have. If you tear pages out of your journal, then this could work well, but I prefer to leave the pages in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the spine broke!
customer_reviews.text: I am slightly irritated as I am only 23 pages into the journal and the spine split! I have been gentle with my journal and even have a nice leather cover for it. I was unaware that the pages here perforated prior to purchasing the journal but the pages are already trying to fall out. I am disappointed in the quality of the journal.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Well made but drab
customer_reviews.text: I got this for poetry writing. I actually write a lot, sometimes feeling very inspired. I noticed though that writing on the dots got me feeling kindof drab... I did get a light-blue lined notebook afterwards which confirmed this. For engineering and machines, yes. For writing other stuff, maybe not. That said, it is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mkh

customer_reviews.title: Not cork but cork print.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cork notebook. The cover is made of cheap plastic and covered with a cork print. It is bulleted and the paper is okay. Comes in a box and then wrapped in plastic
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Thick paper, great for Bullet Journaling
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this notebook for my 2020 bullet journal upon recommendation from my mom. She had used it last year for her bullet journal (and is using it again this year) and really liked it. I love how thick and sturdy the pages are! Each page also has a perforation so if you want to rip out a page it would be easy to do so. It also comes with a built-in bookmark, pocket in the back, and pen loop. I really like how the cover looks like wood! Great product, highly recommend for your 2020 bullet journal in case you haven't found one yet! My only complaint is that the pages are not numbered.
customer_reviews.author: Malori Mayor

customer_reviews.title: Binding fell apart with 2 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: At first, I LOVED this notebook. It was beautiful and perfect for bullet journaling. After I had already spent hours creating spreads through the end of October, the binding completely separated from the pages. I'm really disappointed because I have been using it for less than two weeks, so this should not have happened, but it's not like I can just replace it since I already started journaling.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got my cork dot journal and I’m in love! The cover cork material is so smooth and touchable! The pages are a good weight especially since I want to use my new fountain pen! The elastic for the pen and to hold the book closed are well attached. I can’t wait to get started with my journaling!
customer_reviews.author: Sharmin Panjvani

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful journal
customer_reviews.text: I love these. This is my second one. The cork cover is sturdy and beautiful. The paper is a nice weight with dot pattern. The extra storage pocket inside back cover is also handy for small items. The elastic band keeps the book closed and there is a nice small piece of elastic attached for pen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality dot graph notebook
customer_reviews.text: Great medium-sized notebook for work or personal thoughts. Paper has a good weight and above-average quality to it and the external cover looks quite professional and well-made. I looked at other dot graph notebooks in the same category and they were either significantly more expensive or came in a softbound cover with fewer pages. Very happy with this purchase. If I could improve upon one thing, I would make the dots on each page just a shade lighter as they are quite noticeable and if using pencil the markings do not stand out on the page among the dots themselves but this is just personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S

customer_reviews.title: Best Bullet Journal design.
customer_reviews.text: 1) the pages tear out. Have ypu ever made a mistake and wished you could neatly tear out the page without ruining your entire journal? This is amazing. 2) it has a pen holder. Obviously you can't store all your millions of colors, but for the basic black that you use for the majority of your writing...perfect! 3) it is eco friendly. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sumi Casey

customer_reviews.title: Hard to write in
customer_reviews.text: The pages have perforated edges which make it impossible for them to lay flat. the page pops up every time the pen writes so it makes your writing squiggly and sloppy. It's nearly impossible to have good calligraphy or handwriting with this. I don't want perforated edges, I don't plan to tear my pages out of this journal I want them to stay in.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Great Notebook with Thick Paper and Beautiful Cover
customer_reviews.text: I use this notebook for bullet journaling. After conducting extensive research on the best journal to get, I decided on this one and have not been disappointed. The paper is very thick and smooth allowing for no bleed through or ghosting. The notebook lays flat, too. I was concerned about the perforated pages potentially coming out on their own over time, but this is not an issue at all as they are very secure. I ended up loving be perforated pages option because I could take pages out if I made mistakes or just didn't want them in the notebook.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Thick paper, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Update a year later: I abused this journal heavily for a year and it still looks new. I used it everyday and completely smashed it many times and all is well. Someone gifted me another journal but I will miss the cork feel! Maybe I will gift this other journal away and get another cork. Love this journal. I have been using Tombow Dual Brush pens and they are not leaking through to the other side of the pages. I got the dotted version which is super nice. The cork/sawdust cover is pleasing to the touch. I am glad that I bought this one. Paper is really thick.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Checks off a lot of boxes, and is well made.
customer_reviews.text: I don't typically leave reviews, but this was a nice journal. I've had it for a number of weeks now and am pleased with how it's held up. It hits every mark for me, pen holder, back sleeve, perforated paper, and dotted paper. I also appreciate how absorbent the paper is, I've got a pen that I like a lot that I haven't been able to use on my moleskin journal or others. Also, the cork cover makes this maybe the most hipster purchase I've made lol.
customer_reviews.author: M N

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Reliable Bullet Journal
customer_reviews.text: I wanted more freedom than a traditional planner gives you, so I recently decided to start bullet journaling. I have been in search of the perfect bullet journal for a few weeks. I usually don't leave reviews, but I just received this bullet journal and I love it! It was cheap compared to other journals. It looks and feels like it is good quality. The paper is thick and holds ink very well. I have used a multitude of different pens and markers on it and haven't experienced any bleeding. The paper is also perforated, which is nice in case you mess up. If you are on the fence about a bullet journal, I would highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kaela

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my cork notebook and am loving so far! The cover is smooth to the touch and sturdy. Not only is it aesthetically pleasing, but it's also high quality. The pages are really thick, which can be hard to come by for its price. It doesn' bleed through with the pens I use, so I'm really glad. I'm excited to see how it wears throughout the year!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: perforated sheets - warning not good for bullet journaling
customer_reviews.text: I got mine for bullet journalling / sketching for work (I'm an architect). I'll still use it up but won't purchase it again. It would be amazing if the pages were not perforated, which to me says it won't hold up well. Otherwise it's a nice construction and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nell Lime

customer_reviews.title: No ghosting or bleed through!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through many different journals in my quest to find one that will stand up to my markers, pens and more. So far this journal has done that! The dots help keep my writing in line without being distracting. They also allow me to draw in my own tables with or without the use of a ruler. The spine seems sturdy for long term use. I plan to update at the end of the month after it takes a 1000+ mile road trip with me!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Foote

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, practical journal
customer_reviews.text: This journal is great -- I love the sturdiness of the cover, the lay-flat pages, and the perforations. Plus, it includes a back pocket -- a personal favorite in journals so I can keep my random scraps of paper in one spot rater than sticking out the edges. I'm using this journal for a mix of bullet-journaling, to-do lists, calendars, and stream of conscious thoughts. It fits my needs, plus is cheap and beautiful. I'd definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite notebook I've ever purchased. I've tried the expensive name brand books that are $40+ and one of them can compare to this book. The pages are nice and thick. Minimal ghosting with pens and even some markers. I love that the pages are perforated. The cover is beautiful. Perfect for bullet journaling
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Fits the need that I have and looks great doing them.
customer_reviews.text: I love this journal! The pages are a beautiful soft color, the dot grid is even throughout. Every sheet is perforated, which allows me to use this for more than just a journal. I can create lists or letters that I can take out to send to someone else or if I didn’t how something turned out, it doesn’t have to stay in the book. The only thing that is a little cheap is the braided bookmark.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these to give as gifts and they have been well received. The cork cover looks and feels great, the book is well crafted and I love the dot grid format. I can tell that the book is durable and will hold up to traveling in my purse or computer bag as I love to pull out a notebook to jot down ideas for the various projects I am working on.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Elastic strap broke with less than a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: The journal's elastic strap broke free from the cover after less than a month's worth of use. I bought this journal because it had a loop for a pen and was a dot pattern, these features are nice. The paper is a little too heavy for me and I am afraid the perforations will cause my frequently used pages to tear eventually. I am rating this two stars because the elastic strap broke. It seems to me that it was not secured very well to the cover judging from the amount of elastic that gets embedded in the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Blake

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this journal. When I got it and opened it I like how it came in a box which shows that the brand is making sure that their product stays nice during transportation. I love the overall texture cover, and I think its actually very satisfying to feel. Any and all straps are holding up well and aren't ripping or breaking at the seems. I enjoy the back folder that way I can store stuff with my binder and its all in one spot. I love this journal!! <3
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great Bullet Journal for an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: This dotted bullet journal is as good or better than many other brands out there, and is less expensive. It has the key features I need: environmentally-friendly, dotted, high-quality paper, pen holder, envelope, and overall sturdy high-quality feel. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DEP

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality notebook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this journal to use as my planner/bullet journal for 2020. I started using it and I absolutely love it. The paper is high-quality, and there's no bleed-through. I tend to use felt-tipped pens (I like the way they write), and the paper is thick enough that it barely shows on the other side! (And even then, it really only shows if you're holding the page up to light) The cover is beautiful, it's a perfect size, and I highly recommend this journal to anyone who wants to use it as a notebook, planer, bujo, or for any other reason. 5/5!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette C.

customer_reviews.title: Best journal ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third journal from Lemome I've purchased! I will continue buying this journal. I especially like the dotted version as it allows me to draw small graphs and to-do lists. The best features of this journal are that it has a place marker, a strap to keep it closed, and a pen holder that fits my favorite pen, the Pilot G-2. They hold up for me every semester!
customer_reviews.author: Majimo

customer_reviews.title: I was so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be like my other Lemome journals but it wasn't. The cover binding isn't as sturdy, the pages are perforated and tend to bend and loosen with use. This was all around sad making. I almost cried. I even tried using washi tape to reinforce the pages which is really just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFORATED PAGES
customer_reviews.text: This was my second Lemome notebook. I expected it to be just like my first, but with a different cover. The paper is still nice and thick, and I love that, but I completely missed the fact that THIS cork notebook is NOT just a different cover option; the pages are PERFORATED. That's my fault; I didn't read the description thoroughly enough. I have no need for this feature, and it impedes my writing/drawing near the gutter of the notebook. So... learn from my oversight: THE PAGES ARE PERFORATED.
customer_reviews.author: Josy C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd/4th notebook I have gotten from this company (I bought 2 at the same time). I continue to be impressed by the journals quality and lack of significant flaws. I have carried one around for a couples months now with heavy usage and being thrown all over the place (airports, backpacks, etc) and other than some scratches, I see no significant damage at all. 10/10 Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: madie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bullet journal!
customer_reviews.text: The pages are thick! Handles most of my pens except sharpie. I was able to color a page mostly black in a water based marker without it bleeding. The only downside is the perforated pages. It’s great for when you mess up bit at the beginning and end of each signature, the pages rip very easily because those pages don’t open all the way, so you have to fold it on the perforation, therefor weakening it. Otherwise it’s a really great journal and I contribute to use it! My favorite journal to use!
customer_reviews.author: Chari

customer_reviews.title: A truly great value!
customer_reviews.text: One of my top goals for 2020 is to start bullet journaling. I saw this journal was recommended by The BalanceSMB as their top eco friendly choice. Along with being I think the cheapest option, I was sold. This journal does not disappoint! The paper is great quality; smooth and thick but not bulky. My Pilot G-2 gel pen has not bled through, which is a huge plus! The best part for me, however, is that the pages lay flat when you open the journal. No more bending and warping the spine! Overall, I am so pleased with this purchase and really can not recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Neat Little Journal
customer_reviews.text: This journal feels good, is much thicker than my last journal, and is a nice size for carrying everywhere. I like the way it looks and that it will lay flat. There is a pen loop and ribbon place marker, and a nifty little pocket inside the back cover. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Diedra L. Wittenberg

customer_reviews.title: Affordable product, but pages do bleed a bit with liquid ink pens
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! This has a great sturdy cover with a satisfying texture. The pocket in the back is wonderful and the stickers were a great addition! However the pages do bleed a bit with ink pens as shown above. But overall, a wonderful product for a really reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Pomchi Productions

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy this notebook!
customer_reviews.text: I found this book back in 2018 and ordered one for my 2019 bullet journal. I love that it's eco-friendly paper & perforated. The elastic for the peen loop & to keep the journal closed it sturdy and reliable. I am able to make the most out of the pages. I can fit a whole calendar year & more spreads! There is minimal bleeding, wouldn't recommend using alcohol based pens though. There's cute sticker tabs to help organize spreads. Using it now for my 2020 journal and I still love it. Will continue to buy this journal! Highly recommend for those interested in buying a sustainable bulletjournal.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio Parra

customer_reviews.title: Great paper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this journal, I've tried all different types from different brands and this is my new favorite. Paper thickness is good, and I really like that the pages are perforated so that you can tear them out if needed. I'm using it for my 2020 bullet journal. I think it's a good price. It does not have numbered pages or index pages in the front. Just a simple
customer_reviews.author: Margi de la Fuente

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, smooth notebook.
customer_reviews.text: I love my lemome notebook. I have finished my first and am using my second. There is minimal ghosting, with smooth, heavy paper. The dots are slightly dark if that bothers you. I love having a notebook of sustainably sourced material. The free tabs are also pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Mobster Dolphin

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite journal!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging alone is worth a great review. I felt like I was opening something sleek and amazingly expensive (which it is not....expensive). The pages are really thick and won't bleed. The cover is realistic and will stand up to abuse if tossed in a crowded backpack. I am extremely impressed and happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Lovely design and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bullet journal for habit tracking and goal planning, along with school work deadlines. Never before have I used a bullet journal, so I bought this one due to high reviews and price. What can I say? It is neat and simple—a big fan of the cover and pencil holder. The pages are quite nice and sturdy, with no pen bleeding through the pages. Will I purchase more of these? Definitely and will highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Yesica Castro

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but well made!
customer_reviews.text: I love this notebook! It's large, the pages are thick enough that I don't have to worry too much about bleeding (I use BIC gelocity pens), and the perforations were super convenient, especially since this is my first bullet journal, so there were a few instances of trial and error at the beginning. I also love that it's more environmentally friendly than most notebooks while also looking very sleek. I've gotten a ton of compliments! I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Leonard

customer_reviews.title: I like that I'm not confined to writing on lines but ...
customer_reviews.text: The product comes exactly as shown. I am already loving the bullet print for my new journal. I like that I'm not confined to writing on lines but when I choose to write I can write in a straight line with ease thanks to the dots on each page. Pages are thick, I've used markers and they haven't bled through. Closes with an elastic band, there is a pen holder and a bookmark attached. There is also a pocket in the back for anything that you may hold onto as a keepsake. This may be my new favorite journal yet.
customer_reviews.author: Vashti Williams

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great paper
customer_reviews.text: This journal is perfect to use as a bullet journal - there is no bleed through from any pens I've used. The paper has a smooth feel and nice weight. This is the second year I've bought this journal and I continue to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bullet journal so I don't have a lot to compare to and I wasn't ready to break the bank on one, but this was perfect!! I would definitely purchase it again! The cork cover looks just as advertised! It's very sturdy, the pages do not bleed through, there is a bookmark, pen loop, a cute useful pocket in the back, and an elastic loop to hold it all together. It came nicely wrapped so it would make an excellent gift! I think some comments said the pages were numbered, but mine wasn't and I prefer that. The only thing I'd ask for is an option without perforated pages!
customer_reviews.author: veechee18

customer_reviews.title: Good for bullet journaling
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for my 2020 bullet journal for a couple months now, and I've been happy with it so far. The biggest downfall is the preferated pages for bullet journaling use. Once the edge is bent, the thicker pages are more prone to tear. But that's personal preference and can be avoided by being careful not bending the pages there unless you want to tear it out. The outside hardly shows signs of wear even after nearly a year of use. The pages don't bleed too badly, but do ghost a bit if using really inky markers/pens. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Oviedo

customer_reviews.title: Please Change Packaging
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. After using a dated planner that, honestly, I only really used in spurts, a friend recommended I get a dotted journal and just create pages as I need them. I'm not sure exactly how eco-friendly it is (some say faux cork, some say no), but the packaging could be better. Came in a box wrapped in plastic so...that felt wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: Avery P.

customer_reviews.title: Durable/Recylable Dotted Journal
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this dotted journal and received it within a day. It is much thicker than I expected in terms of page count, which is awesome. The covers are sturdy and the pages are nice so that inky pens do not seep through. 100% recommend for your next dotted journal purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: This is the 3rd Lemome journal I have purchased ad ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Lemome journal I have purchased ad the quality has been exceptional in all of them and I would be considered a notebook snob. My only complaint is they don't come in a variety of colors. I will definitely purchase more of this brands notebooks in the future
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: A great first bullet journal!
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually new to bullet journaling, and this is the first journal that I have purchased, but I love it! The pictures that I have uploaded are sequential, so I’ve written on both sides of the page. You can see the marker shows through a little bit where I have drawn a lot, but it’s really not bad at all. It lays flat very well and the dots are nicely spaced. The cork is softer than I was expecting, and I’m sure it will get even better over time. I highly recommend it as a bullet journal for beginners if you’re looking for a place to start! -AB
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice balance between price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try the bullet journal style of planning. Overall I'm pleased. Details like perforated pages, pen holder, sticker markers to categorize the pages, pocket are thoughtful, but the elastic on the page marker arrived slightly frayed and it'd be nice if the pocket was large enough to accommodate the pages once removed. I do get some bleed through from the journal pens I purchased from the 'frequently purchased with' recommendations but its minor and not a huge issue for me. A few weeks in I would consider repurchasing for myself or as a gift for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bujo! Nice texture, good feature and very unique.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this journal. I'm new to bullet journaling and was looking for an upgrade on my second journal. My first was a Minimalism Art journal (a gift) which worked out well but always felt like a needed just a little more space and some other features. This one fits the bill. Feels about the same in weight but with added features: little thicker and wider paper, perforations and a place to hold my pen. The cork material is also really unique and supposed to be more durable than the faux leather. Very happy with my purchase, will buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent journal that stands out from other ordinary notebooks. The cover is discreet but classy. The cork has a unique feel that you have to try for yourself to really enjoy! Nice features you’d expect- bookmark, elastic band to keep the cover closed, and a pocket in the back cover. Overall a nice journal, better than cheap plain ones but still good quality without having to pay an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Austen

customer_reviews.title: Bullet Journal perfection
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. PROS: Band to hold pen. Band to keep closed. Bookmark. Comes with tabs to make sections. Great size. Comfortable to hold and use. CONS: None. I bought one for my daughter too and will purchase this again when this is full.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This journal has a really nice cover, it's like smooth bark on a tree. It's textured yet provides a smooth finish. The pages are thick so my ink pen doesn't bleed through. The pages also have a perforated edge for easy tear out if the occasion calls for it. The elastic band is securely woven into the back cover of the book. The elastic band is always a point of concern with all elastic bands and I'm thrilled with the overall quality of Lemone's journals. I am, and will continue to be, a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Storlie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bullet Journaling
customer_reviews.text: I have been setting this up as my bullet journal for the past month or so, and I love it! The pages don't bleed, and my ink doesn't smudge. It's a sturdy notebook without being too thick, so I can take it everywhere with me. I have tried a few different types of dotted notebooks over the past few years, and this one is my favorite so far!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherT

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Love it
customer_reviews.text: This book is very nice! The cover is not actual cork but it still looks so pretty. The band that keeps the book closed seems a little flimsy. I'm worried it might snap. The paper is thick and the dots are prominant on a creamy shade of white. There's a little expandable pocket in the back that I've put my stickers and might add some stencils. It even came with what looks like sticker dividers (not sure what to call them lol) and that was a nice little surprise. Over all I love this book so far and i can't wait to fill it! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Says

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot, but there are a couple of issues.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The cover is very soft and looks nice. The paper is thick and good quality. It lays flat when you open it. The bullets are .5cm apart so it's great for drawing or using a ruler. Perforated pages. Cons: The pages are not numbered. When I first opened it the binding separated, and I had to glue it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best journal out there !!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second journal. I love everything about it. I can use any kind of pen,marker or paint and I have never had ghosting. I carry mine in my purse as it goes everywhere with me. If you need a great journal. Also another thing I love about this besides the thick paper is the pages are perforated pages. No more gluing pages together when I make a mistake. Get this one. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Stickney

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic journal
customer_reviews.text: Got this after receiving recommendation from a website online to start my first bulletin journal. I love the thick pages, makes it easy to use whatever type of pen I want in order to design things the way I want. The cork material that the covers are made of feels very... natural and makes it very nice to carry and use. Only gripe I have is the pages aren’t numbered like another journal I was looking at, but hardly a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Chilinski

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to start this years journal. It’s nice, but the perforations are annoying. Unless you specifically know you’ll want to tear pages out I would look for a journal without.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value/Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great notebook. It is high quality. The cork cover is eco friendly and aesthetically pleasing. The interior paper is sturdy and thick. I love the elastic pen holder as well as the elastic band that keeps the book closed. There is also a handy pocket located inside the back cover. I would highly recommend this excellent notebook for a myriad of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, nicely constructed journal
customer_reviews.text: I love these journals so much I've purchased two. I think they'll be my go-to every time I need a new journal. I love the cork cover, it has a nice earthy vibe to it. The dotted pages are great for bullet journaling. The pages are nice and sturdy, and they're perforated if you ever need to remove one. I've had a few journals whose pages tear out too easily, but that is not the case with this one. The elastic band and book mark are nice features as well.
customer_reviews.author: Free Life Films

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand. Reduced my rating because of binding.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using mine for a year. The cover feels so good. Only complaint is perforated pages come apart when I don’t want them to. Bought a different popular brand but ink bleeds through pages. Buying another Lemome without perforation. Yay. Updated 11 months after use. Changed rating because pages broke away from the binding.
customer_reviews.author: theresa Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Bleeding and ghosting problems!
customer_reviews.text: The page has ghosting with almost every different pen I used. It has horrible bleed through with Prismacolor which sucks because they are a fantastic art marker. It even bleed through onto a second page and the back of that as well. I do not recommend for bullet journaling if you plan on being artistically creative. It would work fine for just writing.
customer_reviews.author: josephine

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Great size, love the pocket in the back, and the cover is exactly what I was looking for! I use this as my journal for dungeons and dragons and it fits my forest gnome so perfectly. It’s my first time having a bullet journal and it’s a lot of fun to get creative with! Excellent quality! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Louise Severin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this journal!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought and tried many journals, but this is by far my favorite! Although the pages are not numbered as are some for bullet journaling, I create my own table of contents and number my own pages, which allows me to tear one out now and then! The paper is of then highest quality, smooth and doesn't bleed through. I love the dot grid. Overall, just outstanding! I'm on my third one and thinking about expanding from using them only for my job but also for personal. Would love to see additional cover colors!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Eller

customer_reviews.title: For the creative types.
customer_reviews.text: What every girl wants. This is just as described. Each page has grid dots so you can creat your own design. I recommend purchasing the matching stencil and pen sets. This is for a creative do it yourself person. If you just want organization, buy a day planner.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great for fountain pens
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these several months ago. Loved it so much I just replaced my Leuchtturm 1917 as a journal. The thickness of this paper is WONDERFUL if you use fountain pens - it doesn't bleed through or ghost (unless the ink is super dark &/or the pen is Very wet). Not sure what changed with the 1917, but quality doesn't seem as good. This journal is also less expensive. The pages aren't numbered, but I'll trade that all day long with the quality of this paper.
customer_reviews.author: ANSWER 42

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality of the paper - but DON'T love ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the item as advertised. Love the quality of the paper - but DON'T love the perforated pages! I'm using this as a dot journal/planner and LOVE that my pens don't bleed through the quality paper - however the perforations are causing me great difficulty as many of the pages are starting to come apart at the perforation. :( Love the cover - the look and feel - but next time I'll make sure the pages aren't perforated.
customer_reviews.author: Dennielle Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Quality Check?
customer_reviews.text: Received the journal today and looks like it got dropped. Corner is prett bent outta shape. The box it came in doesn’t have a bad corner so it looks like it was boxed up this way.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Ince

customer_reviews.title: First Bullet Journal!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my cousin, and she adores it. It is her first bullet journal, and she is so excited to use it. It came in really snazzy packing with a nice gift box. The paper is very thick and comes with a cool pocket in the back. The price is right, ladies and gentlemen. For this price, the journal is really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous. You can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous notebook with high quality thick pages. It even comes with page markers and a pen loop. I love the feeling of the cork and the packaging was gorgeous, perfect if you want to gift right away without gift wrap! Just slap on a sticker bow and you’re all set. Honestly believe it’s worth $25 or more!!
customer_reviews.author: eilos

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Overall the journal came nicely packaged without any imperfections. The overall quality is very nice and I am very excited for this purchase. I will be ordering another notebook here soon.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Zapinski

customer_reviews.title: Best by Far....even Better as a Gift!
customer_reviews.text: First off...this notebook is well-packaged....it comes is a box that protects the notebook from accident tears or dents. The notebook stays flat and works well with my frixion pilot erasable pens to keep your notebook tidy and clean...and also comes with a pen holder. I mean this a well thought out notebook and even rivals some of the much pricier ones...it makes an excellent gift for a student, new grad, dads, or groomsmen....I think I’ve found a reasonably priced go-to gift:) I definitely highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

product_meta.title: Dotted Bullet Notebook/Journal - Eco-Friendly Natural Cork Hardcover Dot Grid Notebook with Pen Loop - Premium Thick Paper - A5 (5x8In) Bound Notebook
feature_bullets: ★ ECO FRIENDLY NOTEBOOK - Lemome choose cork fabric as notebook cover, cork is such a versatile, natural and sustainable material. It feels soft and supple to the touch like leather, but its 100% cruelty free and so much better for the environment. Great GIFT for any VEGAN.

★ LAY-FLAT 180° PERFORATED NOTEBOOK - Thread-bound lay-flat design make you reading more easy and note-taking efficiency, enjoy your writing by hand with no distractions. All of the classic notebook pages are micro-perforated, easily to tear off or archiving anytime.

★ PREMIUM THICK PAPER FOR BULLET JOURNALING - Lemome choose high quality acid free writing paper. Which is environmental, recyclable, pollution-free and has no fluorescer, can effectively protect your eyesight. The paper 20%-50% thicker and smoother than normal, suit for most pens.

★ FUNCTIONAL & STYLISH NOTEBOOK - Sturdy Sewn Elastic PEN HOLDER + Expandable POCKET + Elastic Closure STRAP + 1 Ribbon BOOKMARK. Cool cork cover will give your journal a diistinctive look from standard journals. Dimensions: 8.4 x 5.7 in, great for your purpose & perfect size for on-the-go.
★ SPECIAL GIFT - A special gift you can share with your friends and family. Perfect for Christmas gift, New Year gifts or Birthday presents.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,721 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
